channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Intercampus for Correio da Manhã and Negócios, 20–26 November 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 5–7 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 8–10 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 2–3 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • LIVRE (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Iniciativa Liberal (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Chega (ECR): 0–1 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Intercampus for Correio da Manhã and Negócios, 20–26 November 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by Intercampus for Correio da Manhã and Negócios, 20–26 November 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 21.6–28.4%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 31.2–38.8%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 8.5–13.5%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 1.9–4.7%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 6.2–10.6%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 3.4–6.8%
  • LIVRE (Greens/EFA): 1.6–4.3%
  • Iniciativa Liberal (RE): 1.9–4.7%
  • Chega (ECR): 3.4–6.8%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem, 17–21 November 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 24.4–29.9%

  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 2.9–5.3%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 5.5–8.7%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 2.3–4.6%
